wikipedia_page.main: Mark Anthony Proctor (born 15 January 1963) is a male British former athlete who competed in the 2000 Summer Olympics. He was born in Wenhaston, Suffolk.He represented England in the shot put event, at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. He then appeared at the next two Commonwealth Games in 2002 and 2006.

response: * Mark Proctor (racing driver) (born 1968), former British racing driver
* Mark Proctor (footballer) (born 1961), former English footballer and former manager of Scottish football club Livingston
* Mark Proctor (shot putter) (born 1963), British Olympic shot-putter
